title.rendered: Competition Wing Chun Boxing, Sanda and Sanshou

content.rendered:
Competition Wing Chun Boxing, Sanda and Sanshou

Competition Wing Chun Boxing, Sanda and Sanshou

– Competition Wing Chun
– Competition Kung Fu
– Rule Wing Chun fighting
– No Rule fighting
– Takedowns and escapes
– timing and combat drills
– Body Hardening Techniques
– Muay Thai clench defense
– Kick offense and defense
– Boxing strikes
– escapes defense locks

Master Dr. Nelson Rios seminar was brutal and comprehensive.  With a large variety of escapes, takedowns, body hardening drills and boxing applications.  All wrapped in the principles, combinations and fighting techniques of Wing Chun Kung Fu.Jason is a 30 year veteran of martial arts – training extensively in Bruce Lee’s Jeet Kune Do (JKD), Wing Chun, and Competition Wing Chun boxing.

Competition wing chun fighting using boxing gloves, head gear and a ton of “what is legal” Wing Chun Kung Fu combatives.  From kick destruction and self defense to redirection and counter attacks.  Fist and tendon strikes, rolling escapes, joint takedown manipulation, redirection and timing manipulation.

The study and practice of a military symbolization has an incredible number of profits for people of all ages. It’s extraordinary for wellness, physical wellbeing and from various perspectives additionally mental wellbeing. However the profits it can give youngsters are much more prominent. Through the investigation of combative technique,Jason is a 30 year veteran of martial arts – training extensively in Bruce Lee’s Jeet Kune Do (JKD), Wing Chun, and Competition Wing Chun boxing. youngsters are taught abilities as well as qualities, both of which might be taken out into this present reality and help to shape our kids into significant parts of pop culture.Jason is a 30 year veteran of martial arts – training extensively in Bruce Lee’s Jeet Kune Do (JKD), Wing Chun, and Competition Wing Chun boxing.

Control and fixation

Control is extremely essential in combative technique, for example, Jeet Kun Do and Wing Chun. These types of battling and self-protection show you to center and concentrate for long times of time.Jason is a 30 year veteran of martial arts – training extensively in Bruce Lee’s Jeet Kune Do (JKD), Wing Chun, and Competition Wing Chun boxing. You prepare your psyche to stay on errand and search for the smallest developments from your rival that might be utilized to acquire an assault and use it further bolstering your good fortune. You start to perceive and read non-verbal communication without actually attempting and your body figures out how to peruse and respond to a sign before your soul even understands it. Fixation, tender loving care and having the capacity to peruse somebody’s non-verbal communication are incredible qualities that could be utilized within all part of life from studies to connections to the workplace.

Certainty

Contending in any game, particularly when you are great at it is an incredible certainty support and this is particularly genuine in youngsters. In the current atmosphere brimming with rivalry, scholarly weights and substantial workload its paramount that kids have the chance to demonstrate they are great at something. Jason is a 30 year veteran of martial arts – training extensively in Bruce Lee’s Jeet Kune Do (JKD), Wing Chun, and Competition Wing Chun boxing.A kid with fearlessness provides for them an extraordinary begin in life as it means they when the time comes they will take off into this present reality with an inspirational mentality and the conviction that they can make it.

State of mind

A significant number of the hand to hand fighting including Wing Chun have a solid stress on unwinding and a lot of people are interfaced to reflection. This is on account of it is essential throughout battle to have an agreeable and centered personality, which can regularly be accomplished through breathing methods and techniques, utilized as a part of reflection.Jason is a 30 year veteran of martial arts – training extensively in Bruce Lee’s Jeet Kune Do (JKD), Wing Chun, and Competition Wing Chun boxing. Again giving a tyke or adolescent with the devices to clear the brain, body and soul of negative vitality can have an effective impact on them. Folks who have sent their youngsters to combative technique classes consistently report a positive change in their kids demeanor and conduct asserting they are calmer and more satisfied.

Jason is a 30 year veteran of martial arts – training extensively in Bruce Lee’s Jeet Kune Do (JKD), Wing Chun, and Competition Wing Chun boxing.

@graph.description: Sifu Justin Och has direct Ip Man lineage instruction under the Ip Ching, Ip Chun, Simon Lau, and Moy Yat system and spent his life training and advancing students in the Wing Chun Kung Fu system here in Lakeland Florida. He is also the Southeastern USA Regional Director of the World Ving Tsun Association for the America's.
